title: ParaSpider not Mod or MapDev?

replies.body: Due the account hacking, he was banned and the rank are gone. Don't worry not for long, like jozzy. He only have to change all passworts, then he would be back as Mod and MapDev. Now he is playing in his old account TheMasterCow (sadly)
replies.body_tagged: Due the account hacking, he was banned and the rank are gone. Don't worry not for long, like jozzy. He only have to change all passworts, then he would be back as Mod and MapDev. Now he is playing in his old account TheMasterCow (sadly)

replies.body: ParaSpider's account was compromised like many others, for secruity purposes, we moved his ranks to TheMasterCow, his old account.

replies.body: Well there has been this link going around skype. If you go to the website nothing bad happens untill you enter you passwords and usernames. The link starts like http://fourm.hive. And you get a keylogger or something. Then bomb. Your accounts hacked.

Just some extra info
The website I believe is forum.hivecm
But there's the catch,it's hiveCM not hiveMC....
So don't click on any link that says hiveCM

replies.body: If the website is closed or if there's a 404, change your passwords and do a full virus scan.  Usually if they do that, it's just an installer for a trojan or keylogger.
replies.body_tagged: If the website is closed or if there's a 404, change your passwords and do a full virus scan.  Usually if they do that, it's just an installer for a trojan or keylogger.
